offers.offer_text: Get Up To 45% OFF on Domestic Hotels
offers.title: Upto 45% OFF
offers.description: This discount is applicable on Domestic Hotels (On Min. Booking of ₹4000. On Payment via Federal Bank Credit Cards only. Max. Once per user. Only on Monday, Saturday, Sunday. Max. ₹3000 discount can be availed)
offers.terms_and_conditions:
Terms and Conditions

This offer is valid only on online confirmed domestic flights, international flights, Domestic Hotels, Holidays and Bus bookings made through Yatra.

The offer is valid on Federal Bank Credit Cards only.

The offer will be applicable once per user, per product, per card during the offer.

Offer is only valid on the eligible BINs shared by bank. If the BIN series of the card does not match with the one provided by bank to Yatra, then the cardholder will need to approach respective Bank. Yatra shall be entitled to withhold or deny the offer to the customer.

In case of full/partial cancellation Yatra's offer stand void and customer will not be eligible for the discount. Yatra will refund the amount after adjusting the discount and any other applicable charges and penalties.

The customer needs to apply to promo code YRFEDCC to avail the discounts.

On mobile app, the offer is valid on Android and iOS based devices only.

Discounts provided under the offer cannot be clubbed with any other offer or discount extended by Yatra as part of any other arrangement.

All government levies like sales tax, TDS, any local tax, Octroi etc. shall be payable by the customer as applicable at the time the respective discounts were offered.

In the case of refund, the discounted amount will be deducted from the total refund due.

In case of full/partial cancellation Yatra's offer stand void and customer will not be eligible for the discount. Yatra will refund the amount after adjusting the discount and any other applicable charges and penalties.

Yatra.com reserves the right to add, alter, modify all or any of these terms and conditions, or replace wholly or in part, this offer by any other offer, whether similar to this offer or not, or to withdraw it altogether, without prior notice.

All tickets would be subject to availability at the time of booking and will be governed by the standard airline terms and conditions. Cancellation charges/date change penalties will be applicable as per the airline rules for all tickets purchased through this promotion.

Yatra shall not guarantee or be held responsible or liable for any product or service offered by the airlines which is not within the control of Yatra.com.

All purchases made under the program shall be subject to applicable cancellation/date change rules. In the case of a cancellation, Yatra shall reverse the discount and shall not provide an additional discount to the customer.

All offers are subject to availability.

The decision of Yatra.com in all matters connected with or incidental to this offer shall be final and binding.

Offer is only valid on the eligible BINs shared by bank. If the BIN series of the card does not match with the one provided by bank to Yatra, then the cardholder will need to approach respective Bank.Yatra shall be entitled to withhold or deny the offer to the customer.

All purchases made by the customer at www.yatra.com shall be governed by the standard Terms and Conditions (subject to changes) of Yatra, which includes without limitation User Agreement, Privacy Policy or any other product/service related terms and conditions appearing on Yatra’s website www.yatra.com.

All disputes arising out of or in connection with this offer shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the court in Gurugram.

Offer is not applicable for customer redirected from any affiliate channels.

offers.terms_and_conditions:
Terms and Conditions

This offer from Yatra and IDFC FIRST Bank is open to all residents of India holding IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card. The offer can be availed by the customers making a full purchase only through their IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card on Yatra's website www.yatra.com ("Website").

Customers have to fill the promo code " ******" in the promo code field on Yatra.com's payment page along with IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card details to avail the discount.

No Cost EMI is applicable for 6 months tenure only, however offer applicable on all EMI tenures.

IDFC FIRST Bank Cardholders are not bound in any way to participate in this offer. Any participation is voluntary and the offer is being made purely on a 'best effort' basis.

This offer is non-encashable, not extendable and non-negotiable.

This Offer shall be subject to all applicable laws, rules and regulations which are in existence and which may be promulgated anytime by any statutory authority.

IDFC FIRST Bank is not making these offers and neither warrant nor guarantees the delivery, quality, merchantability or suitability of products/services availed of by the IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card members under this offer and the member shall be solely responsible for all effects and consequences therefrom.

Any disputes as regards delivery, quality, warranty, merchantability or suitability of products/services availed of under this offer must be strictly addressed by the IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card members in writing to Merchant/ Brand directly and IDFC FIRST Bank will not entertain any communication in this regard.

IDFC FIRST Bank shall not be liable for any loss or damage whatsoever or for any personal injury that may be suffered, by a IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card member, directly or indirectly, by use or non-use of products/services availed of under this offer.

IDFC FIRST Bank reserves the right, at any time, without prior notice and without assigning any reason whatsoever, to add/alter/modify/change or vary all of these terms and conditions or to replace, wholly or in part, this offer by another offer, whether similar to this offer or not, or to extend or withdraw it altogether.

Above offers is by way of a special offer for select IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card members only and nothing contained herein shall prejudice or affect the terms and conditions of the card member agreement. The terms of the above offers shall be in addition to and not in derogation of the terms contained in the Card members Agreement.

All disputes pertaining to IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Cards, if any, arising out of or in connection with or as a result of above offers or otherwise relating hereto shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts / tribunals in Mumabi only, irrespective of whether courts / tribunals in other areas have concurrent or similar jurisdiction.

All tickets and bookings will be subject to availability at the time of booking and will be governed by the standard airline terms and conditions.

All standard Terms and Conditions (as amended from time to time) mentioned on Yatra website would apply. In case of third party services/products, customer's sole recourse against the third party services/products being provided by third party suppliers shall be with the concerned suppliers only, and shall be subject to said supplier's own terms and conditions.

This offer is not valid for split bookings where customer makes multiple bookings to avail multiple discounts. Yatra reserves the right to recover the discounted amount or cancel the booking if such a case is brought or comes to Yatra's notice.

All purchases made under the program shall be subject to applicable cancellation/date change rules. In case of a cancellation, Yatra shall reverse the discount and shall not provide additional discount to the customer.

In case of full/partial cancellation Yatra's offer stand void and customer will not be eligible for the discount. Yatra will refund the amount after adjusting the discount and any other applicable charges and penalties.

Discounts provided under the offer cannot be clubbed with any other offer or discount extended by Yatra as part of any other arrangement.

Pictures of products shown in the communication sent to the customer either through mailers or advertised on the website, are representative only and may not bear a resemblance to the actual products.

Products offered under this program are subject to availability.

All government levies like sales tax, TDS, any local tax, octroi etc., shall be payable by the customer as applicable at the time the respective discounts were offered.

Customers are not bound in any way to participate in the programs. Any such participation is voluntary and the same is being made purely on a 'best effort basis'.

Yatra reserves the right to modify or change any of the terms and conditions applicable to these programs/offer at any time without any prior notice.

Any disputes arising out of this offer shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of competent courts at Gurgaon, Haryana, India only.

This is limited period offer and both the partners can change the offer terms anytime.

Offer is not applicable for customer redirected from any affiliate channels.

IDFC FIRST Bank Terms and Conditions

I confirm that I have chosen EMI as the payment option to complete this transaction.

I understand that a processing fee of 1% of the transaction amount (minimum ₹99) plus taxes will be charged on this EMI transaction and transaction will be processed in 3 working days. I further acknowledge that in case of EMI transactions requested and processed on Amazon.in, the processing fee charged will be ₹199/- + GST.

Bank has the sole right to decline or accept any EMI conversion request subject to the eligibility of the customer.

I understand that the EMI amount will be a part of the Minimum Amount Due payable during the EMI tenure.

I understand that in case of transaction reversal or cancellation, I must reach out to bank for EMI cancellation. In case of EMI cancellation, foreclosure fee of 3% on the outstanding principal amount of EMI transaction, at the time of foreclosure along with the Pro-Rated Interest will be charged to the customer.

a)Pro-Rated interest is the interest amount applicable for period between EMI conversion date and date of foreclosure in case no EMI is billed.

b)In case any EMI is billed, pro-rated interest amount will be the interest amount applicable between last EMI billed date and date of foreclosure. Interest will not be charged for the remaining EMI tenure post foreclosure.

Entering the PIN number, One-time password or tapping the credit card for contactless payment will be treated as the acceptance of all terms and conditions.

I have fully understood and have accepted the terms and conditions (as given in the cardmember agreement on the website https://www.idfcfirstbank.com) of converting credit card transactions in EMIs.

GST will be applicable on interest; Processing fee and Foreclosure charges will be billed separately along with respective charges.

I understand that the EMI/Subvention and any additional cashback if applicable, may take up to 90 days for processing and will be credited to my credit card by issuing bank, only on receipt of the cashback from the merchant/ manufacturer and subject to Issuing Bank’s discretion.

I understand that in a No-Cost or Low-cost EMI transaction the merchant/manufacturer gives the discount/cashback amount to cover the complete or partial amount of interest levied by the bank.

I understand that Processing/Foreclosure fees/GST applicable on any fees levied by the bank are not part of the No-cost or Low-cost offering provided by the merchant/manufacturer.

I understand that Bank reserves the right to reverse any benefit availed by me, as a cashback or instant discount, in case the EMI transaction is foreclosed.
